Wed like to ask you again, and heres why

No, donate once
Yes, make it monthly

By clicking yes, you acknowledge that you are making a recurring contribution to Larry Lessigs campaign committee, and that the amount selected will be charged to you immediately and on this date every month until the campaign committee is terminated.
